title: Campaign Analytics
lede: Track and analyze campaign performance with detailed metrics and insights.

sections.title: Performance Tracking
sections.content:
Monitor key performance indicators for your calling campaigns.

Key Metrics:

  • Call Volume: Total calls made and answered
  • Success Rate: Percentage of successful conversations
  • Conversion Rate: Leads converted to customers
  • Average Call Duration: Time spent per conversation

sections.title: Analytics Reports
sections.content:
Generate detailed reports for campaign analysis.

  • Real-time Dashboards: Live campaign monitoring
  • Historical Reports: Performance over time
  • Comparative Analysis: Campaign vs campaign performance
  • Custom Exports: Data export for external analysis

metaTitle: Campaign Analytics - Track Performance Metrics | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Analyze campaign performance with detailed metrics. Track conversion rates, call outcomes, and ROI.
metaKeywords: campaign analytics, performance metrics, conversion tracking, ROI analysis, campaign reports, success metrics
